s: Propagation Techniques: Expand your Monstera family through stem cuttings or air layering. For stem cuttings, select a healthy stem with a node, aerial root, and leaves. Place it in water until roots form, then transfer to soil. Air layering involves encouraging roots to form on a stem before planting it. Small Business This product is from a small business brand...
